snippet: Investigators examining a multibillion-dollar trading loss at JPMorgan Chase are focusing on calls in which employees openly discussed how to value troubled bets in a favorable way.
abstract: Investigators examining a multibillion-dollar trading loss at JPMorgan Chase are focusing on calls in which employees openly discussed how to value troubled bets in a favorable way.

byline.original: By BEN PROTESS and AZAM AHMED

headline.main: With Tapes, Authorities Build Criminal Cases Over JPMorgan Loss
headline.print_headline: For JPMorgan, A Case Is Built On Taped Calls
